welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sompting, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The larger and newer of the two terminals at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The older terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited access and no time restrictions.
